title: F/S: SGC 30 1912 T207 Owen Wilson Broadleaf back
author: theblemishedone

posts.post_title: F/S: SGC 30 1912 T207 Owen Wilson Broadleaf back
posts.post_content:
Asking $210 shipped. I know I am new to this forum, but I can be cross-referenced with the same username on Ebay and Blowout. I can also provide references from people I deal with. I would prefer Paypal goods because it protects everybody and I would much rather print my labels.

If the card doesn't sell, I will keep it.

Thanks again!
